title: Whatsapp+ 5.42D Cracked for rooted
description:
*First backup your conversations by pressing OPTION button 
 Go to Settings>Chat settings>Backup Conversations

*Then Uninstall OLDER WHATSAPP & Install freedom,lucky patcher and plus donation (Dont Open any of them Now) ...

*Open Freedom & grant super user permissions

*Click On PLUS DONATION from the app list now PLUS DONATION app will be opened

*There Will be message saying "Thank you for purchasing ...."
((( If you get any error LIKE "Buy from Play store" Then follow Lucky Patcher method[/color]
=> open lucky patcher and click on plus donation
=>open MENU OF PATCHES
=>Go to REMOVE LICENSE VERIFICATION
=>Go to auto mods
=>TICK AUTO MODS,OTHER MODS(EXTREME MODE) AND Apply patch to dalvic cache 
=>it might show some green and some red patches it mean it worked
=>launch plus donation[color=red]  )))[/color]

*Now Install whatsapp+ apk and open WA+ 

*If you have BACKED UP your CHATS then there should be Restore BUTTON , PRESS IT
 (If you Dont get restore button then install original whatsapp from play store , do verification process and then chat with 1-2 person again backup and then uninstall it again install apk that i given to you there will definitely get RESTORE button) 
 
*Wait

*Press Continue and then 

* Enjoy Whatsapp+ with hide last seen feature

*Thumbs up this torrent
